m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- ADB Approves $135 million Loan For Cleaner Coal-fired Power Plant In China February 10th, 2010 by Mridul Chadha Â  Asian Development Bank has approved a loan of $135 million to facilitate the construction of an Integrated Gasification Combined Cycle power plant. Although the power plant will be using coal as the primary fuel it air pollution and greenhouse gas emissions from the plant will be lower than the conventional coal-fired power plants.
